AROUND.

YOU CAN FIND THESE IN YOUR

JUST STICK A TOILET PLUNGER ON

ARE WE CLEAR?

THIS SERIES OF DEBATES IS

AND WE A ARRIVE AT THE RED
PLANET, MARS.

NAME FOR THE ANCIENT ROMAN GOD
OF WARS FAVORITE CANDY BAR.

MARS HAS LONG BEEN THOUGHT OF AS
AN ARIST DUSTY HELLSCAPE WHERE

NO ONE WOULD WANT TO LIVE, WHICH
WHY IT IS OFF CALLED THE TUCSON

OF SPACE BUT AN EXCITING
DISCOVERY HAS BEEN MADE ON MARS,
BOX OFFICE MAGIC FOR MATT DAMON.

ALSO, NASA SCIENTISTS RECENTLY
ANNOUNCED THEY HAVE FOUND

FLOWING WATER ON MARS THANKS TO
THE SEASONAL CHANGES IN DARK

STREAKS SHOWN HERE WHICH ARE
KNOWN AS RECURRING SLOPE LINEAE

BECAUSE THAT SOUNDS SO MUCH
NICER THAN PLANETARY STRETCH
MARKS.

SO HOW CAN THERE BE WATER ON
MARS?

EVIDENCE SUGGESTS THAT DURING
THE NIGHT TIME THE SURFACE OF

THE PLANET BECOMES COVERED WITH
SALTY PUDDLES.

BUT WHERE DO THESE AMAZING POOLS
OF INCREDIBLE LIQUID
UNBELIEVABLY COME FROM?

OUR TOP PUDDLE THER RESTS
BELIEVE THAT DESPITE

TEMPERATURES THAT REACH 60 BELOW
ZERO, VAPOR FROM MARCH'S

ATMOSPHERE MIXES WITH SALT FROM
MARTIAN SOIL TO FORM A LIQUID

BRINE WHICH MEANS IF MARS IS
EVER COLONIZED BY HIPSTERS THE
PICKLES WILL BE AMAZING.

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
